price: Say, “Travel in the land and see how was the end of the wicked.”
arabic: قُلۡ سِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَٱنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
